mean_en: a thin rubber covering that a man wears on his penis during sex in order to prevent a woman from becoming pregnant or to prevent the spread of diseases
sentence: If you have sex with a stranger, always wear a condom! You never know if you might catch something,
sentence_trans: 如果你和陌生人ooxx，记得一定要戴套子！谁知道你会不会因此染上什么病呢。
